content.text: is designed to retrieve and report billing history for a specific account over a defined billing period range. It logs the usage of the report, checks for the existence of billing data, and retrieves detailed billing adjustments for various types of accounts (electric, gas, manual billing). The procedure uses a Common Table Expression (CTE) to consolidate billing adjustments and outputs a detailed report of billing charges, adjustments, and usage metrics.

The procedure involves multiple conditional checks, dynamic SQL logic, and complex joins across several tables. It also uses a CTE to aggregate data from different billing adjustment tables, making it complex in terms of both logic and execution.

: It retrieves the unique account sequence ID and related agency and facility information.
: Using a CTE, it aggregates billing adjustments from multiple sources (electric, gas, manual billing) and calculates various metrics such as billed charges, arrears, and usage.
: The final SELECT statement outputs a detailed report of billing history, including revised and canceled charges, adjustments, and usage metrics, ordered by account number and billing period.

CREATE PROCEDURE [Report].[usp_AccountLevelBillingHistory]
(
    @EmailAddress AS VARCHAR(75)
	,@BillingPeriod1 AS VARCHAR(6)
	,@BillingPeriod2 AS VARCHAR(6)
	,@CurrentAccountNumber AS VARCHAR(15)
	,@StatusCode AS VARCHAR(1) OUTPUT
)
AS
BEGIN
	SET NOCOUNT ON;
	SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;

	DECLARE @spname VARCHAR(100) = OBJECT_NAME(@@PROCID);
	EXEC [Audit].usp_AddReportUsageLog
		@ReportName = @spname,
		@StoredProcName = @spname,
		@RequestedBy = @EmailAddress,
		@prmPublishedBillingPeriod = NULL,
		@prmBillingPeriod = NULL,
		@prmAgency_ies = NULL,
		@prmFacilityNumber_s = NULL,
		@prmStartingBillingPeriod = @BillingPeriod1,
		@prmEndingBillingPeriod	= @BillingPeriod2

    DECLARE @UniqueAccountSeqId AS INT,  @AgencyCodeOEC AS VARCHAR(6), @OECFacilityNumber AS VARCHAR(7);

	IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT DISTINCT A.UniqueAccountSeqid FROM Billing.AccountBilling AS AB
			INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS A ON A.UniqueAccountSeqid = AB.UniqueAccountSeqId
		WHERE A.OriginalAccountNumber = @CurrentAccountNumber AND AB.BillingPeriod BETWEEN @BillingPeriod1 AND @BillingPeriod2)
	BEGIN
		SELECT 'Billing History for ' + @CurrentAccountNumber + ' does not exist for period between ' + @BillingPeriod1 + ' and ' + @BillingPeriod2 + '. Please verify.' AS Error;
		RETURN;
	END;

   IF (@BillingPeriod1 IS NULL AND @BillingPeriod2 IS NULL)
   BEGIN
        SELECT @BillingPeriod1 = MIN(AB.BillingPeriod), @BillingPeriod2 = MAX(AB.BillingPeriod)
        FROM Billing.Account AS A
			INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBilling AS AB ON AB.AccountSeqid = A.AccountSeqid
        WHERE A.CurrentAccountNumber IN (@CurrentAccountNumber)
            AND A.CurrentAccountNumber = A.OriginalAccountNumber
        GROUP BY AB.AccountSeqid;
	END;
    ELSE
	BEGIN
        IF (@BillingPeriod1 IS NOT NULL AND @BillingPeriod2 IS NULL)
		BEGIN
            SELECT @BillingPeriod2 = BillingPeriod
            FROM Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame
            WHERE CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y';
		END;
	END;

    SELECT @UniqueAccountSeqId = A.UniqueAccountSeqid
		,@AgencyCodeOEC = AD.AgencyCodeOEC
		,@OECFacilityNumber = F.OecFacilityNumber
    FROM Billing.Account AS A
        INNER JOIN Billing.Facility AS F ON F.FacilitySeqid = A.FacilityAccount
        INNER JOIN Billing.AgencyDivision AS AD ON AD.AgencyDivisionSeqid = A.AgencyAccount
    WHERE A.UniqueAccountSeqid IN (SELECT DISTINCT A.UniqueAccountSeqid FROM Billing.AccountBilling AS AB
			INNER JOIN Billing.Account AS A ON A.UniqueAccountSeqid = AB.UniqueAccountSeqId
		WHERE A.OriginalAccountNumber = @CurrentAccountNumber AND AB.BillingPeriod BETWEEN @BillingPeriod1 AND @BillingPeriod2)
		AND A.IsCurrentRecord = 'Y';

   WITH CTE_AllAdjustedAccountsAndPeriods AS(
		---- All NYPA accounts adjusted
		SELECT a.CurrentAccountNumber
			,abae.BillingPeriod
			,abae.BillingPeriodRevision
			,AB.RevisedBilledAmount
			,abae.CanceledAmount AS CanceledBilledAmount
			,abae.TotalNetAdjustedAmount AS PaidAdjustmentAmount
			,abae.AccountEnergyUsage AS RevisedEnergyUsage
			,abae.CancelAccountEnergyUsage AS CanceledEnergyUsage
			,abae.AccountDemandUsage AS RevisedDemandUsage
			,abae.CancelAccountDemandUsage AS CanceledDemandUsage
			,AB.ManualPaymentOverrideAmount
			,CAST(COALESCE(ABE.ArrearAmount, 0.00) AS MONEY) AS AccountArrears
			,CAST(0 AS MONEY) AS TerminationBalance
			,CAST(NULL AS NUMERIC(6, 4)) AS SpannedMonthlyPercentage
        FROM Billing.Account AS a
            INNER JOIN Billing.uftn_TableGetOECFacilityNumberByAgencyHierarchy(@AgencyCodeOEC, @OECFacilityNumber, @EmailAddress) AS utgonbah
				ON utgonbah.FacilitySeqid = a.FacilityAccount AND utgonbah.AgencyDivisionSeqID = a.AgencyAccount
            INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectric AS abae ON abae.UniqueAccountSeqId = a.UniqueAccountSeqid
            LEFT JOIN Billing.AccountBilling AS AB ON AB.AccountBillingSeqid = abae.AdjustedAccountBill
            LEFT JOIN Billing.AccountBillingElectric AS ABE ON ABE.AdjustedAccountElectric = abae.AccountBillingAdjustmentElectricSeqid
        WHERE a.UniqueAccountSeqid = @UniqueAccountSeqId AND a.IsCurrentRecord = 'Y'
		UNION ALL
		---- All ConEd Gas accounts adjusted
        SELECT a.CurrentAccountNumber
            ,abag.BillingPeriod
            ,abag.BillingPeriodRevision
            ,abag.RevisedBilledAmount
            ,abag.CanceledBilledAmount
            ,abag.PaidAdjustmentAmount
            ,abag.RevisedTherms AS RevisedEnergyUsage
            ,abag.CanceledTherms AS CanceledEnergyUsage
            ,CAST(0 AS INT) AS RevisedDemandUsage
            ,CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(12, 2)) AS CanceledDemandUsage
            ,AB.ManualPaymentOverrideAmount
            ,CAST(0 AS MONEY) AS AccountArrears
            ,CAST(0 AS MONEY) AS TerminationBalance
            ,abag.SpannedMonthlyPercentage
        FROM Billing.Account AS a INNER JOIN Billing.uftn_TableGetOECFacilityNumberByAgencyHierarchy(@AgencyCodeOEC, @OECFacilityNumber, @EmailAddress) AS utgonbah
				ON utgonbah.FacilitySeqid = a.FacilityAccount AND utgonbah.AgencyDivisionSeqID = a.AgencyAccount
            INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentGas AS abag ON abag.UniqueAccountSeqId = a.UniqueAccountSeqid
            LEFT JOIN Billing.AccountBilling AS AB ON AB.AccountBillingSeqid = abag.AccountBillingSeqid
        WHERE a.UniqueAccountSeqid = @UniqueAccountSeqId AND a.IsCurrentRecord = 'Y'
        UNION ALL
		---- All National Grid Gas accounts adjusted
        SELECT a.CurrentAccountNumber
            ,abacg.BillingPeriod
            ,abacg.BillingPeriodRevision
            ,abacg.RevisedBilledAmount
            ,abacg.CancelBilledAmount
            ,abacg.PaidAdjustmentAmount
            ,abacg.RevisedTherms AS RevisedEnergyUsage
            ,abacg.CancelTherms AS CanceledEnergyUsage
            ,CAST(0 AS INT) AS RevisedDemandUsage
            ,CAST(0 AS NUMERIC(12, 2)) AS CanceledDemandUsage
            ,AB.ManualPaymentOverrideAmount
            ,CAST(COALESCE(abcg.AccountArrears, 0.00) AS MONEY) AS AccountArrears
            ,COALESCE(abcg.TerminationBalance, 0.00) AS TerminationBalance
            ,CASE abacg.SpannedGasChargeAmount WHEN 0 THEN NULL ELSE ROUND(abacg.RevisedBilledAmount / CAST(abacg.SpannedGasChargeAmount AS NUMERIC(18, 4)), 4) END AS SpannedMonthlyPercentage
        FROM Billing.Account AS a
			INNER JOIN Billing.uftn_TableGetOECFacilityNumberByAgencyHierarchy(@AgencyCodeOEC, @OECFacilityNumber, @EmailAddress) AS utgonbah
				ON utgonbah.FacilitySeqid = a.FacilityAccount AND utgonbah.AgencyDivisionSeqID = a.AgencyAccount
            INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGas AS abacg ON abacg.UniqueAccountSeqId = a.UniqueAccountSeqid
            LEFT JOIN Billing.AccountBilling AS AB ON AB.AccountBillingSeqid = abacg.AccountBillingSeqid
            LEFT JOIN Billing.AccountBillingCrisGas AS abcg ON abcg.BillingPeriodRevision = abcg.BillingPeriodRevision
				AND abcg.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGasSeqid = abacg.AccountBillingAdjustmentCrisGasSeqid
        WHERE a.UniqueAccountSeqid = @UniqueAccountSeqId AND a.IsCurrentRecord = 'Y'
        UNION ALL
		---- All Manual Billing accounts adjusted
        SELECT a.CurrentAccountNumber
			,abapb.BillingPeriod
			,abapb.BillingPeriodRevision
			,abapb.RevisedBilledAmount
			,abapb.CanceledBilledAmount
			,abapb.PaidAdjustmentAmount
			,abapb.RevisedEnergy AS RevisedEnergyUsage
			,abapb.CanceledEnergy AS CanceledEnergyUsage
			,abapb.RevisedDemand AS RevisedDemandUsage
			,abapb.CanceledDemand AS CanceledDemandUsage
			,AB.ManualPaymentOverrideAmount
			,CAST(0 AS MONEY) AS AccountArrears
			,CAST(0 AS MONEY) AS TerminationBalance
			,abapb.SpannedMonthlyPercentage
        FROM Billing.Account AS a
			INNER JOIN Billing.uftn_TableGetOECFacilityNumberByAgencyHierarchy(@AgencyCodeOEC, @OECFacilityNumber, @EmailAddress) AS utgonbah
				ON utgonbah.FacilitySeqid = a.FacilityAccount AND utgonbah.AgencyDivisionSeqID = a.AgencyAccount
            INNER JOIN Billing.AccountBillingAdjustmentPaperBill AS abapb ON abapb.UniqueAccountSeqId = a.UniqueAccountSeqid
            LEFT JOIN Billing.AccountBilling AS AB ON AB.AccountBillingSeqid = abapb.AccountBillingSeqid
        WHERE a.UniqueAccountSeqid = @UniqueAccountSeqId AND a.IsCurrentRecord = 'Y')

    SELECT CurrentAccountNumber
		,CAST(CONCAT(dbo.FindMonthFromBillingPeriod(BillingPeriodRevision), NULL, LEFT(BillingPeriodRevision, 4)) AS VARCHAR(50)) AS BillingPeriodRevision
		,CAST(CONCAT(dbo.FindMonthFromBillingPeriod(BillingPeriod), NULL, LEFT(BillingPeriod, 4)) AS VARCHAR(50)) AS BillingPeriod
		,(RevisedBilledAmount - AccountArrears) AS BilledCharges
		,CASE AccountArrears WHEN 0.00 THEN NULL ELSE AccountArrears END AS AccountArrears
		,CASE BillingPeriodRevision WHEN BillingPeriod THEN RevisedBilledAmount ELSE NULL END AS CurrentCharges
		,CASE BillingPeriodRevision WHEN BillingPeriod THEN NULL ELSE RevisedBilledAmount END AS RevisedCharges
		,CASE WHEN SpannedMonthlyPercentage IS NULL THEN NULL
			WHEN BillingPeriodRevision = BillingPeriod THEN NULL
				ELSE CONCAT(CAST(SpannedMonthlyPercentage * 100 AS NUMERIC(6, 2)), '%') END AS [Spanned Allocation %]
		,CASE BillingPeriodRevision WHEN BillingPeriod THEN NULL ELSE -CanceledBilledAmount END AS CanceledCharges
		,CASE BillingPeriodRevision WHEN BillingPeriod THEN NULL ELSE RevisedBilledAmount + CanceledBilledAmount END AS DeltaCharges
		,CASE BillingPeriodRevision WHEN BillingPeriod THEN PaidAdjustmentAmount ELSE NULL END AS PaidAdjustmentAmount
		,CASE BillingPeriodRevision WHEN BillingPeriod THEN ManualPaymentOverrideAmount ELSE NULL END AS ManualPaymentOverrideAmount
		,TerminationBalance AS TerminationBalance
		,RevisedEnergyUsage AS RevisedUsage
		,CASE WHEN BillingPeriod <> BillingPeriodRevision THEN -CanceledEnergyUsage ELSE NULL END AS CanceledUsage
		,CASE BillingPeriodRevision WHEN BillingPeriod THEN NULL ELSE CAST((RevisedEnergyUsage + CanceledEnergyUsage) AS INT) END AS DeltaUsage
		,RevisedDemandUsage AS RevisedDemand
		,CASE BillingPeriodRevision WHEN BillingPeriod THEN NULL ELSE -CanceledDemandUsage END AS CanceledDemand
		,CASE BillingPeriodRevision WHEN BillingPeriod THEN NULL ELSE (RevisedDemandUsage + CanceledDemandUsage) END AS DeltaDemand
    FROM CTE_AllAdjustedAccountsAndPeriods
    WHERE BillingPeriod BETWEEN @BillingPeriod1 AND @BillingPeriod2
    ORDER BY CurrentAccountNumber, BillingPeriod DESC, BillingPeriodRevision DESC;
END;
